name: Thoth
description: Thoth (Ancient Egyptian: Ḏḥwtj) is the Egyptian god of the Moon, Wisdom, Writing, Knowledge, Hieroglyphs, Science, Math, Death, Magic, Time, Art and Judgment. He is the oldest son of Ra. Maat, the goddess of truth, balance, order, harmony, law, morality and justice is his consort. While he has a human form, he is also depicted with a human body and the head of an Ibis.
